channel.title: Need help with a world 2
channel.description: so me and my friend want to combine our server si there a topic any were about a world 2(read hole post) like when they goto my server it shows world 1 mine then they can see a world 2 and when they goto play it it connects to his server and on his serv er for him it say his server is world 1 and im world 2 s when they goto play world 1 ad they connect to his like like on rsps they connect to his server but when they goto play world 2 it connects to my server any topics out there that can give us a tutorial on how to do this or how to give us a idea on how we can do this :confused: :confused: :confused: :cool:

item.title: Need help with a world 2
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Wow, run-on sentences FTW!

OT: There was a client released by someone that had the options of choosing world 1 or world 2. There are multiple ways of doing this, rather than getting a new client.
